page.title: 16Light industry in Binstead
page.content: There are three small factories and a bakery in Binstead. The{bakery started as a family business early in the century by{Mr.W.Cooper.}In those days the premises consisted of a tea shop, bakery, grocer's shop, dairy and Post Office. The bakery business expanded with deliveries all over the Island but in recent years trade has declined due to competition. {Columbia Products}is one of the factories making cosmetics which they {export}all over the world - to Canada Australia, Fiji and Scandinavia. The trade name for their products is {Aronde. {Osborne Electronics}was started as a family business in Osborne Road, Ryde. They make coils for starter motors and employ 180 people. { Clark Masts}make aerials for arc lights, hydraulic masts etc.
